data.title: Android Developer
data.description: Developed a native Android application using Jetpack Compose and Retrofit, collaborating with international teams to deliver a clean, scalable product based on project specifications.

data.title: Software Engineer
data.description: Overhaul and maintained a financial web application using Angular and NGXS, redesigned 500+ UI components, and ensured cross-device reliability through comprehensive testing.

data.title: Software Engineer Intern
data.description: Assisted in developing an E-wallet and Loyalty app with Ionic and Angular, implementing UI components, resolving bugs, and gaining agile workflow and debugging experience.
